Deferred for 1.5.  The error is not seen in release mode and no log either.

This problem occurs whenever a projects JSF library refernces are updated.   The problem will appear in the console but seems to have no ill effect; the libaries are added to the classpath and the J2EE module dependencies approriately.
reopen to look at for 0.5.1 release
Fixed for 1.5.1 by altering references in a WorkspaceJob.

Verified in WTP 1.5.1 M 200609221939.  

Changing the JSF library references in a project several times and do not observe the exception.
